amendment.description: Amendment sought to reauthorize the Weatherization Assistance Program and the State Energy Program through Fiscal Year 2020.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 224 (Roll no. 661).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Tonko.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 224 (Roll no. 661).
